snippet: “For Toyota and Lexus, a driverless car is just a part of the story,” said Mark Templin, a Toyota group vice president. “Our vision is a car equipped with an intelligent, always-attentive co-pilot whose skills contribute to safer driving.”
abstract: “For Toyota and Lexus, a driverless car is just a part of the story,” said Mark Templin, a Toyota group vice president. “Our vision is a car equipped with an intelligent, always-attentive co-pilot whose skills contribute to safer driving.”

headline.main: Lexus Aims Gadgets at Increasing Vehicle Safety

keywords.name: organizations
